item.description:
As Always this is Rain or Shine - LL Bean has some great new lightweight waterproof gear that is wicked good and wicked cheap !

We will meet across from the Peter Pan Bus terminal on Depot Ave at 1 pm. It's the easiest parking lot to find.

The complete trail is about 3 miles. So 6 round trip. It is good for Inline skates if you have them or bikes as well. There are inclines but they are very gradual.

The trail goes through some scenic neighborhoods in Falmouth, along the beach and into Woods Hole where we can stop for a snack or a beverage before our trip back.
item.how_to_find_us: Black Toyota Tundra with the Red Flag on the Antenna

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Falmouth Shining Sea Path Hike, Bike or Inline Skate - Kid & Pet Friendly !
